Name: Rock Snake
About the game: Rock Snake is a game with classic snake gameplay, but unlike other games, this game has extremely high graphics! For those who are suddenly not familiar with this genre of games: the goal of the game is to control a stone snake and grow as big as possible by eating the fruits that lie on the ground. You can lose if you crash into objects on the map, or into yourself. The longer the game goes, the faster the speed becomes, and the snake is longer, so the complexity of the game grows very quickly. Game features: - high quality graphics - pleasant musical accompaniment - full immersion in the game - saved classic gameplay
